Miml's 1.0 release contains:

A jar file with Miml classes (miml-1.0.jar)
A jar file with Miml sources (miml-1.0-sources.jar)
A folder with the dependencies used by the library (dependencies/)
A folder with a some example datasets (data/)
A folder with a some example configurations (configurations/)
A license file (license.txt)
This readme file (readme.txt)
